Source: Das Wetter heute ist sehr schön.
Reference: The weather today is very nice.

Source: Ich liebe es, Bücher zu lesen.
Reference: I love reading books.

Source: Wir werden morgen in den Park gehen.
Reference: We will go to the park tomorrow.

Source: Le ciel est bleu et clair aujourd'hui.
Reference: The sky is blue and clear today.

Source: Elle aime manger des pommes.
Reference: She likes eating apples.

Source: Ils partiront en vacances la semaine prochaine.
Reference: They will go on vacation next week.

Source: El gato duerme en el sofá.
Reference: The cat sleeps on the sofa.

Source: Nos gusta ir a la playa en verano.
Reference: We like going to the beach in summer.

Source: Voy a cocinar una cena deliciosa esta noche.
Reference: I am going to cook a delicious dinner tonight.

Source: Il sole splende e fa caldo.
Reference: The sun is shining and it's warm.

Source: Mi piace ascoltare la musica.
Reference: I like listening to music.

Source: Domani visiteremo un museo.
Reference: Tomorrow we will visit a museum.

Source: Het regent vaak in de herfst.
Reference: It often rains in autumn.

Source: Hij houdt van sporten in zijn vrije tijd.
Reference: He likes to exercise in his free time.

Source: We hebben een nieuwe auto gekocht.
Reference: We bought a new car.

Source: Сегодня на улице очень холодно.
Reference: It is very cold outside today.

Source: Она любит путешествовать по миру.
Reference: She loves traveling around the world.

Source: Мы поедем в Москву на следующей неделе.
Reference: We will go to Moscow next week.

Source: O cachorro está brincando no jardim.
Reference: The dog is playing in the garden.

Source: Nós vamos ao cinema esta noite.
Reference: We are going to the cinema tonight.

Source: Ela gosta de cozinhar comidas deliciosas.
Reference: She likes cooking delicious food.
